Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Good to see you up and about! My name's $Actor_20$ and welcome to the Blue Hare Inn. I know it looks a bit rough, but I think it's a good start yeah? It won't be long until people start showing up. I'll keep the visitors entertained as best I can, but you'll have to check in because I'm sure there'll be people flocking to move here in no time!]
[Name:Hammer][Text:When $Actor_16$ and I were building the Inn, I hit my thumb at least three times with a hammer. I couldn't hold anything for days afterwards.][Default]
[Name:Clumsy][Text:I've always been kind of clumsy. Just one of those things, you know? My mother never gave me anything valuable to hold onto after the Incident with the pickle jar...]
[Name:Busy][Text:There's always things to do around here to keep me busy. Doubt you have it any better though, eh?]

[Name:Scream][Text:I was just putting out the trash last night when I saw this... SHAPE rustling in the bushes. I admit it, I screamed. I thought some horrible monster had crept down from the woods. Turns out it was just $Actor_43$ searching for $Item_100$.][Default][Villager:43]
[Name:5][Text:You seem stressed, have you been making sure to get enough rest? A warrior is useless without sleep.][Default]
[Name:Collection][Text:Oh I.. I can't... how did you know? Thank you!]
[Name:Selection][Text:Hello, what can I do for you?][Selection:VillageTalk]

[Name:Task_17_Start][Text:Hey! How are things, settling in well? Good, good. Glad to hear it. Look, I was thinking... It might help convince people to move in if we thinned out the monsters a bit. I was going for a little stroll this morning and an $Actor_33$ popped out of the bushes! I'm fine, only my dignity is hurt, but since you're the only one with a weapon here, maybe you could go out and encourage them to back off? Thanks.]
[Name:Task_17_End][Text:I can breathe a bit easier now thanks! Although I guess it won't be too long until we've got more of them to deal with... Urgh, it makes my hands itch just thinking about it.]
